tutorial.name: The Qt Creator User Interface
tutorial.description: This tutorial provides you with a principal summary of the Qt Creator User Interface and introduces fundamental terminologies.

tutorial.name: Building and Running an Example Application
tutorial.description: How to verify that your installation works

tutorial.name: Creating a Qt C++ Application
tutorial.description: This tutorial describes how to use Qt Creator to create a small Qt application, Text Finder.

tutorial.name: Creating a Mobile Application
tutorial.description: This tutorial describes how to use Qt Creator to create a small Qt application, that uses the System Information Mobility API to fetch battery information from the device.

tutorial.name: Creating a Qt Quick Application
tutorial.description: This tutorial uses basic elements and illustrates basic concepts of Qt Quick.
